meanings.definition: Not willing to work or act together with others.
meanings.sent1: The noncooperative student refused to join the group project.
meanings.sent2: She was labeled as noncooperative for always working alone.
meanings.sent3: The noncooperative puzzle piece just wouldn't fit in with the others.
meanings.sent4: His noncooperative attitude was like a stubborn rock in the river of teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The noncooperative behavior stood out like a red flag in the team.

meanings.definition: Not showing a willingness to cooperate or participate.
meanings.sent1: The noncooperative cat refused to play with the other pets.
meanings.sent2: He was being noncooperative by ignoring all the requests for help.
meanings.sent3: The noncooperative alarm clock seemed to enjoy waking up late.
meanings.sent4: Her noncooperative mood cast a shadow over the group's plans.
meanings.sent5: The noncooperative weather ruined our outdoor event.
